childMarkdownRemark.html: Your very first content with Contentful, pulled in JSON format using the Content Delivery API. Here

We have been delivering a seven years visionary plan of “Deeper Life & World Mission” for MCAC since two years ago. However, how many of us so far have understood the idea of it and have pursued the vision firmly in our spiritual journeys?
自教會展開推動《深化屬靈生命、委身宣教服侍》的七年計劃至今已經踏入第三年了。我們需要認真地問自己一個重要的問題:「我是否明白這異象方向,並且在屬靈生命裏堅決地朝向這目標追求?」

shortBio.shortBio: 活在基督裏 以基督為中心 燃點宣教心
